content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in bari in 2011 the case involved compensation but the parties and details of the case are not mentioned the case lasted for 14 years from 1997 to 2011 the college issued a final judgment based on previous partial judgments made in 2004 and 2005 the judgment allocated hereditary assets to the parties through a drawing of lots the assets included rustic properties land in the countryside residential units and a garage room the assigned parties were required to make cash payments to each other the court ordered the release of the assigned assets and the transcription of properties in the registry the court also declared the matter closed and ordered the parties to compensate the costs of the case

metadata.subject_of_succession: rustic properties, land in the countryside, residential units, garage room
